content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a private landlord looking to maximize my profit, I have high expectations for the rental price of this exquisite 50 square meter apartment in the heart of München's city center with excellent amenities nearby. However, since we have not discussed specific figures yet, let's begin our negotiation with a competitive initial offer that still allows room for adjustment on your part. I propose the starting price of 1500 Euro per month. Do let me know if this aligns with your budget or if you require a different figure for consideration.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, Mister Schmidt. I think your initial offer is too high. I have found similar apartments in the same area for a lower price. I will offer 1200 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I acknowledge your search results, Yi-Nuo Wang, but it's crucial to understand that my property boasts a prime location and brand-new construction, which sets it apart from other options. For these reasons, I am reluctant to drop the price below 1400 Euro per month. Please consider this revised offer as a concession to your proposal, reflecting my willingness to be flexible while still safeguarding my investment. Let me know if this new figure is acceptable or if you require further adjustments.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate you making concessions. However, I still think your price is too high. I will offer 1300 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While I understand your quest for a competitive rate, Yi-Nuo Wang, it's essential to note that my property's location and condition justify the proposed rental cost. However, in an effort to foster a mutually beneficial arrangement, I am willing to meet you halfway. I agree to the price of 1350 Euro per month, which aligns with my need to maintain a satisfactory return on investment and your desire for a more economical option. Please confirm if this revised offer satisfies your requirements.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, Mister Schmidt. I think 1350 Euro is a reasonable price. I agree to the price of 1350 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
